about_the_game:
Get all "strong offense" animals of the Banana Drama universe! The DLC includes:

- The cockatoo (strong offense)
- The lion (strong offense)

With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama. Thank you very much!

All included animals descriptions:

- Fly cockatoo! Get the incredibly agile Banana Drama cockatoo with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run/fly faster than others ("strong offense" type). Similar to his best friend "Kiki the cockatoo" his abilities are often underestimated due to his cute looks!

- Roaarrrr - the Lion! Get the incredibly proud Banana Drama lion with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run faster than others. A lion throwing bananas is a little unusual at first glance, but he has learnt this effective fighting technique from the monke(y)s!
